description:
exp/gotype: fix build breakage due to https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=ca5e5de48173

Add 'math/big' to blacklist of packages that use shift
operations as yet unsupported by go/types.

(The failure was masked due to local bugfixes in my client.)

messages.text:
Hello rsc@google.com, bradfitz@google.com, bradfitz@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=040e3c08d41e ***

exp/gotype: fix build breakage due to https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=ca5e5de48173

Add 'math/big' to blacklist of packages that use shift
operations as yet unsupported by go/types.

(The failure was masked due to local bugfixes in my client.)

R=rsc, bradfitz, bradfitz
CC=golang-dev

subject: code review 7220057: exp/gotype: fix build breakage due to https://code.goog...
